item.title: re:inforce 2024 presentation with catch
item.description:
re:inforce 2024 presentation with catch

I had the amazing priviledge to co-present at re:inforce!

AWS re:Inforce 2024 - How Catch Group uses AWS WAF Bot Control on their ecommerce platform (NIS306)

In the fast-paced world of ecommerce, security is crucial. This session explores Catch Groupâ€™s journey, the lessons they learned, and how AWS security services empowered them to improve safeguards for their ecommerce platform and customer experience. By leveraging AWS WAF Bot Control for targeted bots, AWS WAF Fraud Control for account takeover prevention, and AWS Shield Advanced, Catch Group was able to gain better visibility into potential threats. This allowed them to identify and implement targeted mitigations to protect against bots, DDoS attacks, and account takeover fraud. As a result, Catch Group was able to provide their customers with a secure and reliable shopping experience.
